data_interactives.title: Ocean Tracks Selector
data_interactives.description: Compare the tracks of Pacific Ocean animals tagged by the Ocean Tracks project. Note that this plugin will not load in SSL.

data_interactives.title: Sampler
data_interactives.description: Has a mixer, a spinner, and a collector for sampling simulation. Modeled on TinkerPlots Sampler and created for the ESTEEM project at NCSU.

data_interactives.title: SRRI Ship Odyssey Data Game
data_interactives.description: Send rats on a dive to find sunken treasure with this SRRI game.

data_interactives.title: SRRI Chainsaw Data Game
data_interactives.description: Fire up a chainsaw and see how many logs you can cut to the right length. SRRI game.

data_interactives.title: SRRI Inference Data Game
data_interactives.description: Another SRRI game. See if you can beat a conservative statistician at his own game -- making good guesses from samples.

data_interactives.title: Cart Weight
data_interactives.description: Win by predicting the total weight of a cart stacked with bricks.

data_interactives.title: Ramp Game (Netlogo version)
data_interactives.description: Win by landing on the target.

data_interactives.title: Floyd's of Fargo
data_interactives.description: Make big money running your own car insurance business!

data_interactives.title: Lunar Lander
data_interactives.description: You and your friends land spacecrafts, then rate your landings.

data_interactives.title: Markov
data_interactives.description: Play Rock, Paper, Scissors with the evil Dr. Markov to save the dog.

data_interactives.title: Proximity
data_interactives.description: Get high scores by shooting a ball to land as close to a target as possible.

data_interactives.title: Shuffleboard
data_interactives.description: Live on the edge-Land a disk on each pad without sliding off to score big!

data_interactives.title: Guess My Number
data_interactives.description: As the title says.

data_interactives.title: Random Number Generator
data_interactives.description: An extremely simple plugin. It generates random numbers between 1 and 100.

data_interactives.title: Fast Plants Simulator
data_interactives.description: Simulate growth of fast plants for use in cognitive interviews.

data_interactives.title: Performance Harness
data_interactives.description: A way to generate data while testing the performance of CODAP.

data_interactives.title: Normal Distribution Sampler
data_interactives.description: A way to generate a sample data set from a normal distribution.

data_interactives.title: TerraPop Plugin
data_interactives.description: Plugin for importing TerraPop data sets.

data_interactives.title: GeoJSON Importer
data_interactives.description: Plugin for importing GeoJSON

data_interactives.title: Wolf-Sheep Predation
data_interactives.description: Netlogo model that explores the stability of predator-prey ecosystems.

data_interactives.title: Ants
data_interactives.description: Netlogo model of an ant colony seeking nearby food.

data_interactives.title: Virus Growth
data_interactives.description: Netlogo model that explores the effect of infectiousness, chance of recovery, and duration of the cycle on infection in a population.

data_interactives.title: Sage
data_interactives.description: A Building Models systems modeler.

data_interactives.title: Data Card
data_interactives.description: Data Card permits the user to browse and modify a data set one case at a time.

data_interactives.title: Track Generator
data_interactives.description: Simulate OceanTracks data with a simple random walk.

data_interactives.title: Pivotal Tracker Importer
data_interactives.description: Import stories and activities from any project in Pivotal Tracker.

data_interactives.title: Spring Mass Model
data_interactives.description: Physics model that simulate a mass suspended on a spring created by the InquirySpace project.

data_interactives.title: DropHTMLTable
data_interactives.description: A basic screen scraper. Drop the contents of an HTML page. The plugin will find the tables to transfer to CODAP.

data_interactives.title: Questionnaire
data_interactives.description: Allows the creation of a document with a questionnaire through which data can be added to CODAP.

data_interactives.title: Collaboration Service
data_interactives.description: Allows multiple users to add data to specified data contexts.

data_interactives.title: Attribute Stacker
data_interactives.description: Allows user to tidy the data set

data_interactives.title: Charts
data_interactives.description: Allows user to create common charts for attributes on the data contexts

data_interactives.title: Desmos Geometry
data_interactives.description: DO NOT MAKE VISIBLE: DESMOS PROTECTIVE OF API

data_interactives.title: Live Dataset
data_interactives.description: Loads a CSV document from the web and periodically updates

data_interactives.title: CODAP Onboarding
data_interactives.description: This is the onboarding plugin for CODAP

data_interactives.title: Ecochamber Simulator
data_interactives.description: Simulates an ecochamber. Plants and animals in a sealed system, and how they affect rates of photosynthesis and respiration. This is part of the InSPECT project.

data_interactives.title: Elodea Simulator
data_interactives.description: Simulates how many bubbles are produce by elodea plant depending on light color, light level, and CO2 level. This is part of the InSPECT project.

data_interactives.title: Sensor Interactive (InquirySpace 2 version)
data_interactives.description: Collect data using Vernier sensors and send the data to CODAP for further analysis

data_interactives.title: Ramp Simulation (InquirySpace 2 version)
data_interactives.description: Win by landing the car on the target. This is part of the InquirySpace 2 project. To run the Game version of this interactive add '?game' to the ramp game url and reload the page.

data_interactives.title: Dataflow Onboarding
data_interactives.description: This is the onboarding plugin for the DataFlow plugin. This is part of the InSPECT project. This must be used in conjunction with the Dataflow plugin

data_interactives.title: Dataflow
data_interactives.description: The DataFlow plugin is part of the InSPECT project. It collects sensor data collected by the InSPECT Raspbery Pis.

data_interactives.title: 2013 CA ACS Data Portal
data_interactives.description: A Data Science Games plugin. It will get a random sample of Californians from the 2013 American Community Survey

data_interactives.title: Data Sonofication
data_interactives.description: The Data Sonofication plugin was created by Takahiko Tsuchiya

data_interactives.title: Draw Tool
data_interactives.description: Annotate an image.

data_interactives.title: USS Data Portal
data_interactives.description: Portal to US census and American Community Survey Data

data_interactives.title: acs
data_interactives.description: ACS data portal: 20000 Californans in 2013

data_interactives.title: arbor
data_interactives.description: Make decision trees by hand!

data_interactives.title: barty
data_interactives.description: BART data for 2015. Over 10 million data points.

data_interactives.title: fish
data_interactives.description: A Commons game where you have to fish for a living

data_interactives.title: geiger
data_interactives.description: Find the radioactive speck without taking a lethal dose

data_interactives.title: journal
data_interactives.description: Nature-of-science helper: write tiny papers to share your data with others.

data_interactives.title: nhanes
data_interactives.description: Data portal for 11,000-ish cases of 2003 data from NHANES

data_interactives.title: stebbins
data_interactives.description: Simulation of natural selection

data_interactives.title: stella
data_interactives.description: Simulation for stellar astronomy

data_interactives.title: xeno
data_interactives.description: Diagnose sick alien creatures. Works with arbor.

data_interactives.title: Table Sharing
data_interactives.description: Allows students to share their data

data_interactives.title: NOAA Weather
data_interactives.description: Get weather data from selected US weather stations

data_interactives.title: Moments Recorder
data_interactives.description: This plugin tracks user actions in CODAP through notification. Each action represents the state of the document at completion of that action. User clicks on an item to bring the CODAP document back to that state
